title: Going fullscreen on mac causes extreme lag
content:
Randomly, as of today, going full screen causes extreme lag For example, in fullscreen mode,

  • I cannot switch tabs without a large delay
  • I cannot type in the search bar without a large delay
  • I cannot exit fullscreen (using cmd + ctrl + f)
  • Bookmark toolbar is hidden
  • Opening a new tab (cmd + t) causes me to just look at a blank, flat-color page for a few seconds
  • All settings cannot be seen

Attached are images of windowed mode, fullscreen mode, and what i mean by "all settings cannot be seen"

This has occurred randomly, I don't know why it happened
creator: sean.kim0327

title: hacked
content: I am a recent hack victim and the perpetrators used Mozilla as a part of their tools. I have screenshots of this. They also used: Symantec DLP, Tor Browser, chrome://global/skin/icons (Tor Browser), bookmarks, removed TrustCor root, Windows, Mac OS, Linux, GeckoView, Snowflake, and HelloVerify. I think it was personal so am taking the phone and Mac to Data Recovery. Anything you can do to help trace these a-wholes? Thanks
creator: rufflychicksvintage

title: Portable Firefox 111 and 112 Won't Start
content:
I've been using the portable version of Firefox for years. Every release up to 110 has worked great. But release 111 and 112 won't start.

title: Conexão não segura
content: Não consigo modificar a conexão de segurança. Todos os aplicativos abrem normal, somente o da NETFLIX que abre e não dá pra assistir. fica a seguinte mensagem: Desculpe pela interrupção, os sites podem abrir conteúdo protegidos está marcada. Gostaria de solucionar o proplema achando uma forma manual de configurar, pois ainda não conseguiu achar esta opção. Obrigada
